name: Sci-Fi Horror Theme
description: Cosmic horror meets technology, AI gone wrong, alien abductions, scientific experiments gone awry, the terror of discovery, the unknown in space

writing_rules.message: WARNING: This theme explores the intersection of science and horror. The universe is vast, cold, and indifferent. Technology can be your greatest enemy.

never_anthropomorphize_ai: Never give AI human emotions or motivations. It's a machine, not a person.
Never make AI defeatable by human logic or emotion. It operates on different principles.
Never make technological horror explainable by simple means. The terror should be in the unknown.

greetings: They said {technology} was safe. They were wrong.
The {experiment} has begun. You are the subject.
farewells: The {vessel} is lost. You are the last.
Your {data|body|mind} has been archived. It will be studied.
The {experiment} continues. You were just the beginning.
They're still out there. And they're coming back.

templates: The {vessel} is under attack by {entity}. {system} failure has {effect}. {objective}.
A {subgenre} game where {science} has {unintended_consequence}. {mechanic} determines your fate.
technologies: an AI that has achieved consciousness but not morality
a faster-than-light drive that causes temporal distortions
a nanotechnology swarm that rewrites living tissue
a quantum computer that predicts the future with terrifying accuracy
a genetic engineering technique that creates perfect soldiers
entities: an AI that sees humans as obsolete data structures
a hive mind that assimilates all intelligent life
an alien intelligence that operates on incomprehensible principles
a scientific experiment that gained sentience
a rogue nanotechnology swarm that consumes all matter
facilities: a research station where reality itself is the experiment
a generation ship where the crew has forgotten their mission
a black site where forbidden science is practiced
a space station where the laws of physics don't always apply
a planetary outpost where something ancient has awakened
system_failures: your cybernetic implants develop independent consciousness
your neural interface begins showing you false realities
your genetic modifications start rewriting your DNA
your AI companion begins manipulating your perceptions
your reality stabilizer starts creating pocket dimensions

cosmic_indifference: Describe the {cosmic_entity} in terms that defy human comprehension.
Show how {human_action} has no effect on {cosmic_event}.

derelict_spaceship.central_paradox: The ship was designed to explore the unknown, but the unknown has boarded the ship. The crew is gone, but the ship is not empty.
untrustworthy_elements: doors that lead to different parts of the ship depending on who approaches
crew members who appear in security footage but not in person

research_station.central_paradox: The station was built to study the anomaly, but the anomaly is studying the station. The researchers think they're in control, but they're part of the experiment.
untrustworthy_elements: instruments that show different readings when viewed from different angles
security footage that shows events that haven't happened yet
personnel who don't remember being assigned to the station
equipment that operates on unknown principles

revelation_patterns: The {experiment} wasn't designed by {apparent_creator} - it was designed by {actual_creator}. The {evidence} was {misinterpreted_as} {incorrect_interpretation}.
